examples: in memory of our dearly beloved son, John
en memoria de nuestro amado hijo Juan
They were glad to be back in their beloved Ireland.
Se alegraron de estar de regreso en su amada Irlanda.
the deep purple flowers so beloved by artists
las flores de color púrpura oscuro tan amadas por los artistas
She was beloved by all who knew her.
Ella era amada por todos los que la conocían.
